com.iritech.mqel704

Class IrisCapture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iritech.mqel704.IrisCapture

  • public class IrisCapture
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the methods for capturing irises.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IrisCapture.CameraPreviewCallback 
      protected static class  IrisCapture.Notification 
      static interface  IrisCapture.OnCaptureListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked to inform user status of capturing process and result image

      • CAPTURE_FOR_VERIFYING

        public static final int CAPTURE_FOR_VERIFYING
        Used to start the capture process to get the best iris image for verifying.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CAPTURE_FOR_IDENTIFYING

        public static final int CAPTURE_FOR_IDENTIFYING
        Used to start the capture process to get the best iris image for identifying.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CAPTURE_FOR_ENROLLMENT_LIVE

        public static final int CAPTURE_FOR_ENROLLMENT_LIVE
        Used to start the capture process with stringent evaluation to choose the high quality iris image that is qualified for enrollment.
        The completion percentage of this progress will be updated via callback to OnCaptureListener::onCaptureNotify().
        The best iris images can be left, right and unknown sides.
        See Also:
        IrisCapture.OnCaptureListener, Constant Field Values

      • mIrisCamera

        protected IrisCamera mIrisCamera

    • Constructor Detail

      • IrisCapture

        public IrisCapture(android.content.Context context)
        Construct an IrisCapture object with the given context. This cares about license path. This checks app is non-sys or sys app a determines path to licenses.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context object.

      • getSdkVersion

        public static int getSdkVersion()
        Retrieves the version number of the current library.
        Returns:
        The return value includes the major and minor version numbers of the SDK in the higher-order word, and information about build number in the lower-order word. The lower-order byte of the higher-order word specifies the major version number, in decimal notation. The lower-order byte of this word specifies the minor version number, in decimal notation. 
        For example: the version 2.0.2 will have value 0x02000002

      • getSdkDescription

        public static java.lang.String getSdkDescription()
        Retrieves the description of the current library.
        Returns:
        The description of the library.

      • scanDevices

        public int scanDevices(java.util.List<java.lang.String> deviceUris)
        Scan list of available iris camera connected to host via the given communication channel type.
        Parameters:
        deviceUris - Empty list of string to be filled with uri(s) of devices. This param must be initialized before passing to the function.
        Returns:
        Returns OK value indicates success. All other values indicate failure.
        See Also:
        GemResult

      • setCamera

        public int setCamera(IrisCamera camera)
        Set the camera to be started for iris image capture.
        Parameters:
        camera - The IrisCamera object
        Returns:
        values in GemResult. GemResult.IDDK_OK if success and other values for failure
        See Also:
        IrisCamera

      • getCamera

        public IrisCamera getCamera()
        Get the camera which start the iris capturing process.
        Returns:
        The IrisCamera object.
        See Also:
        IrisCamera

      • startCapture

        public int startCapture(int capturePurpose,
                        java.lang.String sessionId)
        Starts a new capture. It will start iris sensor to capture iris images.
        Parameters:
        capturePurpose - A value indicating the purpose of the capturing iris images. The capturePurpose argument must be one of the purposes in {CAPTURE_FOR_VERIFYING, CAPTURE_FOR_IDENTIFYING, CAPTURE_FOR_ENROLLMENT_LIVE).
        sessionId - The string used to identify this capture session.
        Returns:
        values in GemResult. GemResult.IDDK_OK if success and other values for failure.

      • stopCapture

        public int stopCapture()
        Stops the capturing process even though no qualified image has been captured.
        Capturing process has been cancelled. Users call stopCapture() without waiting for it to finish properly or when the device cannot get streaming images from the camera sensor.
        Returns:
        values in GemResult. GemResult.IDDK_OK if success and other values for failure

      • setPreviewLayout

        public int setPreviewLayout(android.view.ViewGroup group)
        Sets the ViewGroup to be used for live preview of evaluated images.
        Parameters:
        group - The ViewGroup object to be used for live preview.
        Returns:
        values in GemResult. GemResult.IDDK_OK if success and other values for failure
        See Also:
        ViewGroup

      • getResultImages

        public int getResultImages(ImageData left,
                           ImageData right,
                           ImageData unknown)
        Retrieves the best (left/right) captured iris image from the captured eye image. Before calling this function, users have to make sure that captured image is available in the device.
        Parameters:
        left - The object of ImageData to receive output of result image for left eye.
        right - The object of ImageData to receive output of result image for right eye.
        Returns:
        values in GemResult. GemResult.IDDK_OK if success and other values for failure
        See Also:
        ImageData
